column9: inasmuch as data for in vivo effects on collagen formation by cardiac fibroblasts are conflicting."

column3: salicylic acid (3 mM) reduced CFTR Cl- current by 50+/-8% with an apparent reduction in single channel amplitude from 1.08+/-0.03 pA to 0.48+/-0.06 pA (n = 4)."
